team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Samvidhann Seva is a citizen-driven initiative to make the Constitution accessible and engaging
team.founderBio: Ayush Raj builds AI-powered learning tools and web platforms focused on simplifying complex topics for students and citizens. He has experience creating SaaS products like LeadSwift and working on hackathons and AI projects. Passionate about civic education, he started Samvidhann Seva to help every Indian, from Class 6 students to working professionals, understand the Constitution in a friendly, practical way.

resources.faq1Q: Is Samvidhann Seva completely free to use?
resources.faq1A: Yes! Samvidhann Seva is 100% free. We believe constitutional education should be accessible to everyone. There are no hidden charges, no premium features, and no subscriptions required.
resources.faq2Q: Do I need to create an account or login?
resources.faq2A: No, you don't need to create any account. All features including lessons, games, and progress tracking work without any registration. Your progress is saved locally on your device using browser storage.
resources.faq3Q: How is my progress saved if I don't have an account?
resources.faq3A: Your learning progress, completed lessons, and game scores are saved in your browser's local storage. This means your progress stays on your device. If you clear browser data or use a different device, you'll start fresh.
resources.faq4Q: Can teachers use this in classrooms?
resources.faq4A: Absolutely! Teachers can project Samvidhann Seva lessons and games in classrooms. The content is aligned with NCERT curriculum and suitable for Classes 6-12. Games can be played as group activities or competitions.
resources.faq5A: Samvidhann Seva is available in 11 languages: English, Hindi, Bengali, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Odia, and Punjabi. We're working on adding more regional languages soon.
resources.faq6Q: Is the content suitable for competitive exam preparation?
resources.faq6A: Yes! The 'College & Competitive Exams' level covers topics in-depth for UPSC, SSC, State PSC, and other exams. We include detailed explanations, important articles, amendments, and landmark cases.
resources.faq7Q: Can I download lessons for offline reading?
resources.faq7A: Currently, lessons are available only online. However, you can bookmark the website and access it anytime. We're planning to add PDF download and offline reading features in future updates.
resources.faq8Q: How accurate is the constitutional information provided?
resources.faq8A: All content is carefully researched and cross-verified with official sources including the Constitution of India, Government websites, and NCERT textbooks. We regularly update content to reflect amendments and changes.
resources.faq9Q: Can I suggest new features or report errors?
resources.faq9A: Yes! We welcome your feedback. Please visit our Contact page and share your suggestions, report errors, or request new features. We read every message and continuously improve based on user feedback.
resources.faq10Q: How can I support or contribute to Samvidhann Seva?
resources.faq10A: You can support us by: 1) Sharing Samvidhann Seva with students, teachers, and friends, 2) Providing feedback to help us improve, 3) Joining our team as a content writer, translator, or developer - contact us through the Contact page!
